Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> !pools

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I've been busy but I am still alive and well

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I am working on a crazy way to make it so Hush full nodes do not need to download that 700MB sprout-groth16.param file

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> https://github.com/MyHush/librustzcash

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> It's like I want to put a new light fixture on the top floor of a building, and to make that work, I must go change part of the foundation + sewer system

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> at first I thought it was too hard and not worth the work, but maybe I have found a solution

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <AkiraX> Nice.  I figured you went in vacation.  Said you were planning on one

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> "working" vacation, maybe üòÖ

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> our librustzcash compiles, that is nice

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> at first i thought we would have to maintain our own fork of that code and make lots of annoying changes

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> now it looks like it may be possible to do what we want with a tiny patch, that we tell our build system to apply to the official zcash version of librustzcash

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> that would mean not needing our own github releases and updating lots of sha256 hashes

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> hush compiles, starts up, syncs. It seems to work. I am modifying SilentDragon now to not download the 700MB file

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> First Hush shielded transaction created from a node with no sprout-groth16.params : https://explorer.myhush.org/tx/a8a85a525fe8634f0ab80a644d3aee9c04a7773884f503f43b4ae6bd9723a9bb

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Hush is the first Zcash coin to do anything like this, that is the first shielded transaction from any Zcash coin ever, without groth16 files. This saves every node 700MB download, which is huge

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> All Zcash coins currently download about 1.6GB of files to operate, before downloading the blockchain

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Via 2 recent changes to removes Sprout stuff (since Hush v3 is the first Pure Saping zcash chain), we are down to just 50MB !!!

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> 1.6GB down to 50MB

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> So now Hush full nodes only have to download 3% of what they used to, it's the first Zcash protocol coin to make this kind of optimization. It's possible because we removed all support for Sprout

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Since no KMD chain has any groth16 stuff, this can be sent to KMD as well and all asset chain full nodes can save 700MB

Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> not sure why, but that gif is amazing
